name: Shrinking House
description:
This was my entry for Global Game Jam 2019.

You must find playing cards around a room in order, from ace through to king. But the cards are hidden, and not all the same size. To help you, you can shrink and grow as you please.

Controls: WASD to move, QE to change size, mouse to look around.

Warning: This game may not work properly on Windows 10.
